version_description:
* View artwork images full screen. When viewing a project, tap on an image to view it full screen.
* Download individual images. When viewing an image full screen, you can download it.
* View your likes. You can now view the items that you've liked.
* Connections. Manage your followers and who you are following.

* Download individual images. When viewing an image full screen, you can download it.
* View your likes. You can now view the items that you've liked.
* Connections. Manage your followers and who you are following.

Awesome new features this release!

COLLECTIONS
Collect your favourite artworks into folders - great for saving references for inspiration later on.

JOBS
Jobs from major game and movie studios are now delivered directly to your mobile device! Get hired!

NEW ICON
We're standardizing everything on a darker palette. Our new app icon reflects this with a beautiful darker icon.

Along with the usual bug fixes and performance upgrades.

This is a major release! After a hiatus on updates, we have now resumed active development of the ArtStation iOS app. This release is a maintenance release that paves the way for lots of exciting features coming shortly.

Fixes & Improvements:
- Design improvements to make it more consistent with the website
- Nested comments - like on the website
- Project assets show captions - like on the website
- All users can view comments, even when not signed in
- You can click on a user from the comments section to view their profile
- Numerous bug fixes and improvements

- All users can view comments, even when not signed in
- You can click on a user from the comments section to view their profile
- Numerous bug fixes and improvements

This is a major release! After a hiatus on updates, we have now resumed active development of the ArtStation iOS app. This release is a maintenance release that paves the way for lots of exciting features coming shortly.

Fixes & Improvements:
- Design improvements to make it more consistent with the website
- Nested comments - like on the website
- Project assets show captions - like on the website
- All users can view comments, even when not signed in

* Full artist profiles! We now support full artist profiles to match what's on the website.
* Albums on artist profiles. We now show albums on user profiles.
* User verification - same as on website, new users go through verification to stop lame and fake users.
* Better storage management. The app now uses less space.
* Many bug fixes and improvements!

* Many bug fixes and improvements!

We’re always improving the ArtStation App!

• Improved searching
We’ve improved the search functionality quite a bit in the app. So now, it’s super easy to find an artist. You can filter artists by the same criteria as on the website (e.g. Skills, Software, Location).

• Jobs filter by country
When browsing the jobs section, you can now filter by country to find that dream job in your country!

• Updated album support
We’ve updated the artist album support to match what’s on the website. We recently made improvements on artist albums that allow artists to set a Featured album on their profiles, set visibility and reorder the ‘All’ album.

* Share to ArtStation from other apps! Those of you creating art from other apps can now share directly to ArtStation.
* Message settings. You can now edit your messaging settings from within the app.
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* Publish & edit artworks!
This is a major update to the app, enabling you to now post and edit artworks to your portfolio from the iOS app!

* New artist onboarding
Users new to the app now have a nicer onboarding experience to get your artist profile started.

* Bug fixes and improvements
We're always updating the apps and squishing bugs.

Added ability to edit and delete comments

Blogs have arrived!
Full blogs browsing experience with a blog index page and complete blog posts

Fixes
Fixed Facebook verification, you should now be able to sign in and sign up with Facebook again
Fixed the bug that wouldn't let users select and save skills on their profile

Big updates!
Activity Feed
* Moved descriptions from the activity feed to individual project pages freeing up your screen space for more art.
* Added a scroll component to activity feed items that previews all of the assets in a project.
* Add projects to collections from the activity feed project action bar.
Structure and navigation
* Updated the bottom nav tabs to better reflect user behavior.
* Split notifications up by type.
Collections
* View and edit collections from the new collections screen.
* Create public and private collections.
* Add projects to collections from anywhere in the app.
General
* Improved project page interface.
* Moved profile editing to a separate page, away from the main profile interface.

OFFLINE PORTFOLIO
It is now possible to view your own portfolio while being offline. The app will regularly synchronise and store your portfolio on your device, so you can access it at all times, even without access to an Internet connection.
Upgraded Activity Feed layout, improved UX, reworked the abuse report functionality.

BUG FIX
Fixed bug that crashed app when Marmoset and panorama views were opened on iOS 9.
Added ability to edit and delete comments

We care about keeping our community safe and welcoming for all of our users, so we've implemented a few new features that will help us make that possible.

NEW SIGN IN / SIGN UP FLOW
Users can sign up for an ArtStation account seamlessly and have direct access to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy from the sign up flow.

IMPROVED ABUSE REPORTING AND USER BLOCKING
It is now much simpler for users to report inappropriate content and the artists posting it.

We care about keeping our community safe and welcoming for all of our users, so we've implemented a few new features that will help us make that possible.

* Moved descriptions from the activity feed to individual project pages freeing up your screen space for more art.
* Added a scroll component to activity feed items that previews all of the assets in a project.
* Add projects to collections from the activity feed project action bar.
Structure and navigation
* Updated the bottom nav tabs to better reflect user behavior.
* Split notifications up by type.
Collections
* View and edit collections from the new collections screen.
* Create public and private collections.
* Add projects to collections from anywhere in the app.
General
* Improved project page interface.
* Moved profile editing to a separate page, away from the main profile interface.

This is a huge release for us!

New Home
We have completely revamped our activity feed for much better interaction and discovery of artworks. This is the new home screen for the ArtStation app.

You can now preview images, videos, panos, 3D models directly from the home feed. We’ve added actions for artworks & blogs on the home screen. A project skeleton when opening the app also makes the loading experience much smoother.

Improved UI for Artworks
When viewing artworks, we’ve improved the UI now so you don’t have to scroll as much to view everything. The UI and experience for comments on artworks has also been improved.

Smart Zoom
Tap on any artwork image in a specific spot and it will expand the image zooming into that spot.

We have another jam packed release coming at you!

Artwork on notifications screen
You can now scroll through your notifications using the same layout as the Home and Browse screens to view all the new artworks from artists you follow.

Albums on artist profiles
When browsing on artist profiles, albums are now much simpler to view.

Look around with 360 panos
When viewing panos in full screen mode, you can now move your phone around to view the scene, for a better immersive experience.

Enjoy and stay safe!

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

View artwork assets and description in a single screen (no swiping!) with the new info-modal
When you see an artwork you want a closer look at, tap the “i” to open the Info Modal. On this new screen, you can view all the images, video and 3D assets on a single screen.

Made it easier to Follow your favourite artists
We’ve added a Follow button on artwork feeds so that you can tell immediately if you’re already following an artist or not. Tap on it to follow that artist. We have also disabled the user panel on artworks from users you already follow, and on notifications, etc.

New setting - Use first asset as thumbnail
In your settings, tap on “Display” and then “Use first asset as thumbnail” to change artworks to display the first image/video/asset as the thumbnail instead of the default.

Show new button - Never miss a beat!
As you’re browsing the ArtStation app, if there’s updates to the feed, a “Show new” button appears that you can tap to go to the top of the feed.

Coming at you with another action packed release!

New Search Screens
Search has been improved with a whole new design and UX for faster and more enjoyable searching of artwork. The app now lets you keep a search history for quickly coming back to those searches.

Updated View Likes screen
Checking out who liked your artwork and blog posts is simpler and more streamlined.

We’re pleased to announce the initial release of Two-Factor Authentication on ArtStation to protect your account. The Two-Factor Auth system uses the ArtStation App as an authentication device so that if your account login is ever compromised, the attacker still won’t be able to sign in. For those of who value your ArtStation account, or are marketplace/prints sellers, we highly recommend turning on Two-Factor Auth.

To get started, enable Two-Factor Auth in your mobile app settings.

For those of who value your ArtStation account, or are marketplace/prints sellers, we highly recommend turning on Two-Factor Auth.

To get started, enable Two-Factor Auth in your mobile app settings.

We have a great new release for you!

New Layout Options on iPad
From your iPad, choose between a Mosaic or Grid layout for your home screen to customize your browsing experience.

Sign-In with Apple
Sign in at the click of a button with your Apple account when logging in from your iOS device.

Blog Post Screen
When browsing a feed, you can now tap into a blog post to read the entire blog post.

Artwork Detail Screen Design Improvements
When browsing any feed, tap on the “i” button to open the Artwork Detail Screen where you can see the entire description, images/videos/assets, and comments. This is really great for viewing a project as a whole.

Save/Share GIFs
You can now save and share GIFs from a project directly from the ArtStation app.

2 Factor Authentication for Account Deletion
We’ve made further improvements to protect your account. If someone accesses your account on another computer and you have 2 Factor Auth enabled, they won’t be able to delete your account without passing through a 2nd Factor Auth. We HIGHLY RECOMMEND that users enable 2 Factor Auth on ArtStation to protect your portfolio, marketplace products, prints, and private information.

Browse Artwork Without Distractions
The buttons and the navigation are now temporarily hidden when you scroll through the Browse page so there’s less clutter and more space to view the artwork.

IMPROVED LAYOUT FOR ARTWORK DETAILS
The artwork details screen on the iPad version is now optimized to show you all the information you need and more whether you’re viewing on portrait or landscape mode.

EXPLORE MORE
The newly released “More by” section on the details screen enables art lovers to easily discover and browse more artwork by the same artist.

ADD TO COLLECTION
Viewing an artwork you love? Now you can add it to collection directly from the artwork details page.

LONG TAP TO ZOOM
From your grid screen, long tap to zoom in on images on the browse, search, home (iPad only) and collection pages.

Easy-to-Manage Notifications
We’ve sorted your notifications into two sections so you can hone in on what’s most important to you.

Grouped Notifications
Notification events are now grouped by period so you can get a quick snapshot of your most relevant updates.

Other Sections Tab
Read the latest magazine articles and blogs, discover job opportunities or find stunning prints for your space.

Discover ArtStation Prints
ArtStation Prints have been added to profiles and updates so that visitors can discover prints by artists they love faster and more easily.

NEW & IMPROVED UPLOAD FORM
The redesigned form enables the uploading of YouTube/Vimeo videos and Sketchfab files. Select up to 3 mediums to make your work more discoverable.

DISPLAY YOUR WORK OPTIMALLY
New image fitting options let you choose whether your artwork should fit in view or maximize width.
